title: 83/339/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 June 1983 adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC in Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 June 1983
adjusting the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC in Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(83/339/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in Greece contained in the Annex to Directive 81/645/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 June 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 327, 24. 11. 1982, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 238, 24. 8. 1981, p. 1.
ANNEX
